title: SC verdict on abrogation of Article 370 Explained Live: Court directs Centre to restore J&K statehood, conduct assembly elections by September 2024
selftext: This is the victory of democracy. Supreme court, the last bastion of independent legal institution in india in an ever growing powerful political atmosphere of BJP government upheld its integrity today.
comments: Good. With a deadline hopefully the central government will move faster to restore statehood.
if i am not mistaken, deadline is for elections as j&k is UT with legislature. for statehood restoration, SC directed to do it "as early as possible"
